thread.title: Malkin scores, Penguins top Senators 2-0 for 1st victory
thread.title_full: Malkin scores, Penguins top Senators 2-0 for 1st victory

title: Malkin scores, Penguins top Senators 2-0 for 1st victory
text: Malkin scores, Penguins top Senators 2-0 for 1st victory Friday, 16 October 2015 (5 minutes ago) PITTSBURGH (AP) " Evgeni Malkin scored his first goal in nearly seven months and Marc-Andre Fleury stopped 22 shots for his 39th career shutout as the Pittsburgh Penguins beat the Ottawa Senators 2-0 on Thursday night.Rookie Daniel...
